A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: #NOTMYLUKE\n\nThree decades of commitment to a story to be thrown out by a director in order to be edgy or daring is not that at all. It's disrespectful to the fans. I'm not exited for the next one...hell any upcoming one anymore. Luke was my window into Star Wars. You've lost me Disney. George Lucas's Star Wars is where it ends for me and is what I will teach my kids.
